Author: John Lines

MedicLog logs medical information with a focus on simplicity and privacy. It is licenced under GPLv3 or later.

Privacy Policy

Mediclog stores personal information, which you have entered, or possibly collected via another app. This data is stored within the private storage used by the MedicLog app, until you decide to send it via some other app to some destination of your choice.

What type of information is collected?

The app collects the information you enter, plus the date and time, and this is stored in the format described in Data Format on the documentation for the app.

Who has access to your information?

Nobody has access to your information, unless you send it to them by means of the Send button.
